body:
Hmm. I still haven’t really heard anything from Gamora in the past couple of days. Not ever since that strange conversation the two of us had about rom-coms.

Perhaps I’ll try “messaging” her.

blog.name: thebittermountainwriting
blog.title: A Fan Blog
blog.description:
Where I mainly share my fic writing, drawing , and reblog fannish things.

Genderfluid. Ask me what my pronouns are today.

I follow from little-fierce-one

My fic is found at AO3, username: thebittermountain. If you’d like a name to call me, you can use “Bits”

summary: A Rec List of Marvel Fics
body:
A Rec List of Marvel Fics

So, these are some of my favorite Marvel fics that I thought I’d share.


In Days of Grief and Soul-Borne Storm by thefrogg. This is a Hawkeye-focused fic with Mission: Impossible, Hurt Locker, & S.W.A.T. crossovers. You don’t really need to know those fandoms though. It has D/s dynamics, and multiple polyam relationships. The main ship is Clint/Natasha/Coulson


The Cahill Project, a collab by Amerou, GalahadsGurl, & Caitriona_3. So many crossovers that I can’t name them. They’re all Jeremy Renner’s characters. It’s complicated to explain, but it is really involved and sprawling and wonderful.


I Saw The Light series by MissGraceOMalley. A soulmate fic in which Darcy Lewis is a Stark and the soulmate of Bucky Barnes & Steve Rogers. I don’t always love soulmate fics, but this is really good.


The Silver Answer by dirtybinary. In which the serum wasn’t real, but Steve and Bucky helped the war effort anyway. Flips between traditional story format, and a biography/history and interview format.


The Guiding of Death by RayShippouUchiha. A Persephone and Hades reborn AU. It is beautiful and heart-breaking. I don’t usually read Steve-bashing fics, but this is so well written that it’s worth it. Not to mention, Steve eventually learns. Oh, and it’s also a female Tony fic.


The Miskatonic Project by copperbadge. I mean, firstly, Sam’s writing is always amazing. But secondly, this is an eldritch/Cthulhu/Lovecraftian Steve, and it’s amazing. It made me fall in love with Lovecraftian fusions even though Lovecraft was a crappy person.


Breath of Ash, Bone of Dust by qqueenofhades. This is another Persephone and Hades AU, but with Daredevil characters. It’s really fantastic, and I love the characterization of Karen in this story.


All The Leaves Are Brown (And The Sky Is Gray) by AvacadoLove. In which, after Bucky kills Howard and Maria, he breaks free of his programming and basically adopts Tony Stark and they travel all over the world.


Not Easily Conquered series by dropdeaddream & WhatAreFears. Steve doesn’t go down with the plane, Bucky still falls off the train, Steve marries Peggy, and Bucky wrote love letters to Steve during the war that he never sent. It’s beautiful, and at times heartbreaking.


Bulletproof by foxxcub. Two-part, no powers, college au. One is Steve/Tony focused, and the other is Coulson/Clint focused


The Ghost and his artist husband by Tator. I am a sucker for mafia or mob aus. This is a no-powers modern au that hasn’t been updated for two years, but it’s still wonderful. Bucky is the Mob boss, and Steve is his artist, gallery-owner husband, who is just as stubborn as in canon.


Barnes & The Brooklyn Irish by zetsubonna. This is another mob au, but Steve & Bucky were involved in the mob before WWII, so yes, Captain America is part of the mob. It crosses over with Saints Row, but I don’t think you need to know that fandom to understand the story. It’s a WIP that hasn’t been updated for a while, but is still fantastic.


This is in no way comprehensive, but I hope it gives ppl some new favorite reads. I’d love to see what people rec in the comments and reblogs!

summary: I'm putting together a Daredevil discord server just for the kicks of it. Would anyone be interested in joining it once I'm done...
body:
I’m putting together a Daredevil discord server just for the kicks of it. Would anyone be interested in joining it once I’m done setting it up?

It’s main point is the Russian mafia from season 1 and I have some channels for them specifically. The rest of the server will have channels for Daredevil specific and then anything Marvel related!

summary:
Steve: Nat, I wish you’d talk about yourself more. 
Natasha: I tried opening up about my feelings one time. 
Steve:...
body:
Steve: Nat, I wish you’d talk about yourself more.

Natasha: I tried opening up about my feelings one time.

Steve: And?

Natasha: Killed him soon after.

Steve:

Natasha: He knew too much.

summary: Part of a collab with some other folks, I drew the Sonyverse's Venom. Eddie was my favorite part of the 90's Spiderman cartoon...
caption:
Part of a collab with some other folks, I drew the Sonyverse’s Venom. Eddie was my favorite part of the 90’s Spiderman cartoon and I guess my favorite character from that series in general. GOD I wish he was in the MCU…
.
.
I still haven’t seen the movie. But I’m gonna watch it tonight whether it’s good or bad. .

Follow me everywhere
Instagram Tumblr Facebook Deviant art

blog.name: i-need-a-hero-i-need-a-loki
blog.title: "Your savior is here!"
blog.description:
I'm Loki, the God of mischief and a prankster. I'm gender fluid and pansexual. I've ran for president and sadly I didn't win (from the Vote Loki comic). I don't want to EVER do Get Help. My powers dont work if I'm in water or wet. (or at least that is how it worked in Journey into Mystery #85) - RULES:no slaves or pets (i will accept animals like dogs or cows or whatever not humans.) or BDSM stuff please. I'm not interested. No child abuse or anything sexually to do with children sexually - I love children and I'm very gently with them and I will adopt all of them. -
I miss Asgard and my mother. - Right now I'm currently "dead" because Thanos choked me but he didn't do it hard enough. - no thorki or starker please.- 
my side blogs: @baby-im-as-super-as-they-are @thor-loves-lesbians @polite-leader-wants-to-purge @bucky-barnes-loves-steve-and-sam @sir-thomas-sharpe-loves-edith 
feel free to message me or send ask whenever you want! 
my mun is 18.
please do not reblog someone elses rps! I've had that happen before. so if you want to Rp just send me ask or message me
muns email: HalloweenOreosAreTheBest@gmail.com

Or Sigyn
